ComicInfo.Summary:
Things heat up in the penultimate issue of Twilight Command! One of Flores’s own puts his life on the line for his squad, and the Cylon plot proves to be much more of a threat than anyone imagined!
A desperate mission puts Twilight Command’s back against the wall, and with time running out they may not be able to stop Cavil’s plan in time!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Brent Schoonover & Alberto Silva | 1 | B | Cover B | Breno Tamura & Dijjo Lima | 2 | C/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Brent Schoonover | 3 | D/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Breno Tamura & Dijjo Lima | 4 | E/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Brent Schoonover & Alberto Silva | 5 |
